info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Schenectady, southeastern Fulton, southwestern Saratoga and central Montgomery Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 354 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fonda, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Amsterdam, Gloversville, Johnstown, Fonda, Glenville, Ballston Spa, Broadalbin, Hagaman, Round Lake, Fort Johnson, Galway, Burnt Hills, Rock City Falls, Tribes Hill, Country Knolls, North Ballston Spa, Pattersonville-Rotterdam Junction, Greenfield and Charlton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 27 and 28. Interstate 87 between exits 10 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern and east central New York.
